WorkflowInfo.Name: Compress files larger than 5MB
WorkflowInfo.Description: Compress files with size larger than 5MB
WorkflowInfo.XML: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:FolderList;Assembly=FolderList, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns1="clr-namespace:GetRows;Assembly=GetRows, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns2="clr-namespace:GetRowsCount;Assembly=GetRowsCount, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns3="clr-namespace:ExitWhile;Assembly=ExitWhile, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns4="clr-namespace:GetCellValue;Assembly=GetCellValue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns5="clr-namespace:FileSize;Assembly=FileSize, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns6="clr-namespace:ReturnValue;Assembly=ReturnValue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns7="clr-namespace:ZipCompress;Assembly=ZipCompress, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"><ns0:FolderList Password="" TimeInSeconds="0" HostName="LocalHost" x:Name="folderList1" DisplayName="List Folder" IsValid="True" HostId="1" TimeSelection="30.00:00:00" Path="c:\logs" Filter="0" TypeName="FolderList" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" isRecursive="1" Condition="0" Timeout="00:05:00" UserName="" Description="List the contents of the specified folder." FilterSelection="False" MapDrive="True" /><ns1:GetRows RowNumber="" x:Name="getRows1" HostName="{x:Null}" RowContains="File" ResultSet="%folderList1%" Timeout="00:01:00" IsValid="True" isRowNumber="1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" DisplayName="Get Rows" ResultSetName="folderList1" TimeInSeconds="0" Description="Gets specified rows from a resultset." HostId="0" TypeName="GetRows" /><ns2:GetRowsCount IsValid="True" x:Name="getRowsCount1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ResultSet="%getRows1%" DisplayName="Get Rows Count" ResultSetName="getRows1" Description="Gets the amount of rows in a resultset." TypeName="GetRowsCount" /><WhileActivity x:Name="whileActivity1" Condition="{x:Null}"><SequenceActivity x:Name="sequenceActivity1"><ns3:ExitWhile IsValid="True" x:Name="exitWhile1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Counter="%getRowsCount1%" Description="Exit current while activity" DisplayName="Exit While" TypeName="ExitWhile" /><ns4:GetCellValue ColumnType="Number" IsValid="True" x:Name="FileName" ColumnNumber="3" ResultSet="%getRows1%" RowNumber="%exitWhile1%" ResultSetName="getRows1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /><ns4:GetCellValue ColumnType="Number" IsValid="True" x:Name="FilePath" ColumnNumber="4" ResultSet="%getRows1%" RowNumber="%exitWhile1%" ResultSetName="getRows1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /><ns5:FileSize IsValid="True" x:Name="fileSize1" HostName="LocalHost" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" DisplayName="Get File Size" Path="%FilePath%" Password="" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Gets the selected file size." HostId="1" TypeName="FileSize" UserName="" /><IfElseActivity x:Name="ifElseActivity1"><IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity1"><ns6:ReturnValue Value="5" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="False" UseStoredValue="False" ConditionType="=>" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=&&& => 5" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="UserDefinedValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /><ns7:ZipCompress SrcPassword="" TimeInSeconds="0" DstHostName="Localhost" HostName="LocalHost" DisplayName="Zip Compression" IsValid="True" HostId="1" x:Name="zipCompress1" TypeName="ZipCompress" DstPath="%FilePath%.zip" SrcHostName="Localhost" EncryptionType="Standard" DstPassword="" Timeout="00:01:00" SrcPath="%FilePath%" ArchivePassword="" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Creates a Zip Compressed file with the specified compression type." DstUserName="" isPasswordEnabled="0" ZipCompressionLevel="Super Fast" SrcUserName="" /></IfElseBranchActivity><IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity2"><ns6:ReturnValue Value="5" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue2" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="True" UseStoredValue="False" ConditionType="<" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=&&& < 5" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="UserDefinedValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /></IfElseBranchActivity></IfElseActivity></SequenceActivity></WhileActivity></SequentialWorkflowActivity>
